body_html:
There is no public API in tf right now to subclass variables. If you want to continue depending on the private implementation details you can inherit from the internal RefVariable type instead of Variable, but it doesn't have a subclass API.

I think you use-case can be addressed by Variable.from_proto, though.
body_text:
There is no public API in tf right now to subclass variables. If you want to continue depending on the private implementation details you can inherit from the internal RefVariable type instead of Variable, but it doesn't have a subclass API.
I think you use-case can be addressed by Variable.from_proto, though.
body:
There is no public API in tf right now to subclass variables. If you want to continue depending on the private implementation details you can inherit from the internal RefVariable type instead of Variable, but it doesn't have a subclass API.

I think you use-case can be addressed by Variable.from_proto, though.
